question: HI, i was diagnosed with type 1 about a month ago with a sugar of 1.1k and an a1c of 13.  Im taking lantus, and novolog. About 4-5 months ago my hair started falling out, i would notice very large amounts in the sink and in hte shower, and now, i can simply pull my hair out with 2 fingers. What can i do? What does my diabetes have to do with this?My sugars have been between 80-110 constantly after getting out of the hospital, will this help?
title: Type 1 hairloss
